name: ChaosEsqueAnthology

screenshots.caption: Foliage mutator plus mounted gun mutator enabled.
An anti tower (pit) map. Part of. Suggested Foliage enabled by default on this, Plus bumper mutator.

short_description:
A modification of Xonotic which included extended weapons, maps, vehicles, buildable buildings, mounted weapons, spell casting, monsters, player characters, textures, and game mode (such as colorwar (think liquidwar))

To pick up items press F.
To enter vehicles/mountedguns press F.
To reload press R.
To walk press W A S D (direction)
To jump press SpaceBar

Main QuakeC repo (This is where the game code is edited):
http://chaosesqueanthology.git.sourceforge.net/git/gitweb.cgi?p=chaosesqueanthology/xonotic-data.pk3dir;a=summary

Source for the media:
http://chaosesqueanthology.git.sourceforge.net/git/gitweb.cgi?p=chaosesqueanthology/mediasource;a=summary

Other data, maps, etc are in the .iso

Dev Enviorment in tar.gz: https://sourceforge.net/projects/chaosesquedevenv/

DVD Case and DVD Labels and
Extras: https://sourceforge.net/projects/chaoseesquesupplemental/

Special thanks to NASA for images of Earth and Mars.
